perturbation.original_text: TAG shall make payment within twenty (20) days after receipt of LMG's invoice. Any amount not paid when due will thereafter bear interest at the rate of one percent (1%) per month.
perturbation.changed_text: TAG shall make payment within twenty (20) days after receipt of LMG's invoice. Any amount not paid when due will not accrue interest.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates a direct contradiction regarding whether late payments accrue interest. The original text states that interest accrues at 1% per month, while the modified text states that no interest will be charged, leading to ambiguity regarding the financial penalties for late payments.

perturbation.original_text: LMG's indemnification obligations under this Section 5.2 will expire twelve (12) months after the Conversion Date.
perturbation.changed_text: LMG's indemnification obligations under this Section 5.2 will not expire.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction by removing the expiration date of LMG's indemnification obligations. The original text specifies a 12-month expiration after the Conversion Date, while the modified text implies that the obligations continue indefinitely. This introduces uncertainty regarding the duration of LMG's liability.

perturbation.original_text: All such policies of insurance of LMG shall provide that the insurer will give at least thirty (30) days prior written notice of cancellation to TAG.
perturbation.changed_text: All such policies of insurance of LMG shall provide that the insurer will give at least ten (10) days prior written notice of cancellation to TAG.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction on the number of days prior written notice the insurer must provide to TAG. The original text specifies 30 days while the modified text specifies 10 days. This creates an inconsistency in the protection afforded to TAG, leading to uncertainty regarding how many days of warning TAG should expect before an insurance policy of LMG is cancelled.
